hymn.title: With Christ Identified
hymn.category: Union with Christ—Identified with His Death and Resurrection

layout.singingstanza: God re -- al -- ized by us, With Christ i -- den -- ti -- fied— God re -- con -- ciled us to Him -- self, Now Christ, i -- den -- ti -- fied!

lyrics.stanza: God realized by us, With Christ identified— God reconciled us to Himself, Now Christ, identified!
In likeness of His death, That is, newness of life— Ourselves be reckoned dead to sin, But live to God, in Christ.
We would present ourselves, To God, from dead—alive. Present our members "righteous slaves," Become thus sanctified.
